item.title: Routing - Controller
item.description: Routing In SlimFit, you can define routing in app/Http/routes.php file in the same way as Slim 3. <?php $app = app(); // Use basic closure, setName is method to name to route, it is optional $app->get('/', function ($req, $res) { return $res->withJson(['hello' => 'world']); })->setName('home'); // Use controller class, which Home is controller in namespace App\Http\Controller and hello is method name $app->get('/', 'Home:hello')->setName('home'); // Add a middleware, mw_token is middleware named 'token' which defined in app/Http/Kernel.
